casebody.data:
In the Matter of N.T. No. 119PA15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 2, 2015. W. Michael Spivey, Rocky Mount, for Townsend, James. Roger A. Askew, for Wake County Human Services. Shannon Hoff, Charlotte, for GAL. Claire H. Duff, for Wake County Human Services. John Michael Durnovich, Charlotte, for GAL.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of December 2015 by Guardian ad Litem to Substitute Counsel:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd of December 2015."
